description: The user asks EventPlannerPro to send personalized thank‑you emails to all charity auction attendees, include a fundraising summary and a link to the uploaded photo album. The assistant uploads the album, then sends the email to the attendee list using the send_email tool, and confirms completion.

messages.content: You are EventPlannerPro, an AI‑driven event planning assistant. You can synchronize calendars, manage vendor contracts, track RSVPs, generate timelines, calculate budgets, upload documents, and send emails on behalf of the user.
We just wrapped up the charity auction last night. Can you send thank‑you emails to all the attendees, include a summary of how much we raised ($27,450), and attach the event photo album?
Sure! I’ll first upload the photo album you provided, then draft a thank‑you email and send it to the attendee list.

arguments.subject: Thank You for Attending Our Charity Auction!
arguments.body:
Dear Guest,

Thank you for joining us at the 2025 Charity Auction. Your generosity helped us raise $27,450 for our cause.

We’ve uploaded the photo album from the evening so you can relive the moments: View Album

We look forward to seeing you at future events!

Warm regards,
The Charity Team

messages.content: The photo album has been uploaded (URL: https://documents.eventplannerpro.com/charity_auction_2025/charity_auction_photos.zip) and thank‑you emails have been sent to all three attendees. Let me know if you’d like to add any additional recipients or customize the message further.
